title: Bug 6410 - File appears as dirtied by code assist but remains unchanged
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though there are no actual changes made. As a result, the code assist feature does not appear.
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied but remains unchanged. The code assist feature does not appear.
SR:
1. Open the file in the editor.
2. Trigger the code assist feature.
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirtied.
4. Verify that there are no actual changes made to the file.
5. Note that the code assist feature does not appear.
